00007 #ifndef MECAB_STREAM_WRAPPER_H
00008 #define MECAB_STREAM_WRAPPER_H
00009 
00010 #include <iostream>
00011 #include <fstream>
00012 #include <cstring>
00013 
00014 namespace MeCab {
00015 
00016 class istream_wrapper {
00017  private:
00018   std::istream* is_;
00019  public:
00020   std::istream &operator*() const  { return *is_; }
00021   std::istream *operator->() const { return is_;  }
00022   explicit istream_wrapper(const char* filename): is_(0) {
00023     if (std::strcmp(filename, "-") == 0)
00024       is_ = &std::cin;
00025     else
00026       is_ = new std::ifstream(filename);
00027   }
00028 
00029   virtual ~istream_wrapper() {
00030     if (is_ != &std::cin) delete is_;
00031   }
00032 };
00033 
00034 class ostream_wrapper {
00035  private:
00036   std::ostream* os_;
00037  public:
00038   std::ostream &operator*() const  { return *os_; }
00039   std::ostream *operator->() const { return os_;  }
00040   explicit ostream_wrapper(const char* filename): os_(0) {
00041     if (std::strcmp(filename, "-") == 0)
00042       os_ = &std::cout;
00043     else
00044       os_ = new std::ofstream(filename);
00045   }
00046 
00047   virtual ~ostream_wrapper() {
00048     if (os_ != &std::cout) delete os_;
00049   }
00050 };
00051 }
00052 
00053 #endif
